thread.title: BRIEF-Sohu.Com Board Unanimously Approved Dissolution Of Co And Adopted Plan Of Complete Liquidation And Dissolution Of Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sohu.Com Board Unanimously Approved Dissolution Of Co And Adopted Plan Of Complete Liquidation And Dissolution Of Co

organizations.name: complete liquidation and dissolution of co
com board unanimously approved dissolution of co

text:
April 2 (Reuters) - Sohu.Com Inc:
* BOARD UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED DISSOLUTION OF CO AND ADOPTED PLAN OF COMPLETE LIQUIDATION AND DISSOLUTION OF CO
* ANTICIPATED THAT COâ€™S ADSS TO BE LISTED, TRADED ON NASDAQ GLOBAL SELECT MARKET IN PLACE OF SHARES OF COMMON STOCK OF CO
* SHARES OF COMMON STOCK OF CO WILL BE DELISTED AND CEASE TRADING FOLLOWING LIQUIDATION Source text: ( bit.ly/2pYX3CV ) Further company coverage:
